thread.title: Location, Location!! Value, ALWAYS clean! Couple blocks from Union Square. - Review
thread.title_full: Location, Location!! Value, ALWAYS clean! Couple blocks from Union Square. - Review of Seafarers & International House, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michael W
title: Location, Location!! Value, ALWAYS clean! Couple blocks from Union Square. - Review
text: This place is great for the basics. Very clean bedding. Beds are comfortable. Small flat screen with 45/50 channels. A/C in every room. Rooms are always very fairly priced. The location is superior. Everything is close by, subway, Union Square park, restaurants, shopping, outdoor market.. if you are ever in a pinch, this place is a great, affordable choice.. with top location. ENJOY
